headline.print_headline: California Woman Freed After 17 Years, Declared Innocent of Murder
headline.main: California Woman Freed After 17 Years, Declared Innocent of Murder

lead_paragraph: A 59-year-old California woman who spent 17 years in prison for murder was ordered freed on Friday by a judge who said she was wrongly convicted on the basis of testimony by a woman known to be a habitual liar, the Los Angeles Times reported on Friday.
